name: TRI-COUNTY INDUSTRIES, INC., and Tri-County Landfill, Inc. Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION, an Administrative Agency of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Tri-County Industries, Inc. v. Pennsylvania Department of Environmental Protection

parties: TRI-COUNTY INDUSTRIES, INC., and Tri-County Landfill, Inc. Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION, an Administrative Agency of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 23 rd day of November, 1998, the order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
TRI-COUNTY INDUSTRIES, INC., and Tri-County Landfill, Inc. Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION, an Administrative Agency of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 23, 1998.
